name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto & Stock Prices, Ticker, Tracker & More

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Investing Tool for stocks, bitcoin etc. Market Stats, Trends & More

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Investing Titans presents this is a free chrome extension (with 12 tools) created to help people get more information for their investments in the stock market, crypto currencies like Bitcoin (BTC) or Ethereum  (eth) and so on. There are no suggestions on what to do, it merely provides you informational data about the different markets. This extension includes prices for all Crypto currencies as well as the top stock markets, shows you which are currently the top, which are trending, which have gained or lost the most value recently. You can also set up price alerts, convert currencies from crypto to fiat like BTC to USD for example. You can also use this to see volume, prices, rates and see the different stats. You can also set up crypto alerts for bitcoin or any other one. Lots of useful information for you. You can take a look at the tutorial video to see everything this can do and help you with.
